name: rea-playspace
description: A visual node-and-edge playspace for exploring Valueflows and REA accounting

scripts.build: cd modules/typed-object-tweezers && pnpm build && cd - && cd modules/store-adaptors && pnpm build && cd - && cd modules/valueflows-models && pnpm build && cd - && cd modules/data-providers && pnpm build && cd - && cd modules/yaati && pnpm build && cd -
scripts.hc:redo: pnpm run hc:happ-pack && pnpm run hc:run
scripts.hc:run: sh -c 'set -o allexport; . environments/.env; set +o allexport; rm -rf $REA_PLAYSPACE_ROOT$REA_PLAYSPACE_DIR; . scripts/happ-run.sh'
scripts.hc:run2: sh -c 'set -o allexport; . environments/.env.dev2; set +o allexport; rm -rf $REA_PLAYSPACE_ROOT$REA_PLAYSPACE_DIR; . scripts/happ-run.sh'
scripts.playground: sh -c 'set -o allexport; . environments/.env; set +o allexport; npx @holochain-playground/cli ws://localhost:$REA_PLAYSPACE_ADMIN_WS_PORT'
scripts.playground2: sh -c 'set -o allexport; . environments/.env.dev2; set +o allexport; npx @holochain-playground/cli ws://localhost:$REA_PLAYSPACE_ADMIN_WS_PORT'
scripts.webhapp-pack: pnpm run web-zip && hc web-app pack workdir/
scripts.web-zip: pnpm run web-build && cd ui/dist && zip -r ../ui.zip .

author: Shane O'Donnell <shane.odonnell@steeltoad.io>, Jillian Ada Burrows <jill@adaburrows.com>, Connor Turland <connor@sprillow.com>
